attributes.action: Award Nigel Johnson of BBC Radio Stoke an MBE in the next honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'Our Nige' is the voice of Stoke City and on the 10th March 2007 commentates his 1500th Stoke City game for Radio Stoke, going back to 1969. He has juggled this with his own career as a junior school headmaster until health problems. He still came back to the radio though and is the best local radio commentator in the country
